com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources

Class VideosResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.AbstractResource
      • com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.VideosResource

  • public class VideosResource
extends AbstractResource
    The VideosResource provides the functionality to access the /videos endpoints of the Twitch API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.AbstractResource

      • VideosResource

        public VideosResource(java.lang.String baseUrl,

        Construct the resource using the Twitch API base URL and specified API version.
        Parameters:

        apiVersion - the requested version of the Twitch API

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public void get(java.lang.String id,
                VideoResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a Video object.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the Video
        handler - the response handler

      • getTop

        public void getTop(com.mb3364.http.RequestParams params,
                   VideosResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Video's created in a given time period sorted by number of views, most popular first.
        Parameters:
        params - the optional request parameters:
        • limit: the maximum number of objects in array. Maximum is 100.
        • offset: the object offset for pagination. Default is 0.
        • game: Returns only videos from game.
        • period: Returns only videos created in time period. Valid values are week, month, or all. Default is week.
        handler - the response handler

      • getTop

        public void getTop(VideosResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Video's created in a given time period sorted by number of views, most popular first.
        Parameters:
        handler - the response handler

      • getFollowed

        public void getFollowed(com.mb3364.http.RequestParams params,
                        VideosResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Video's from channels that the authenticated user is following. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_READ
        Parameters:
        params - the optional request parameters:
        • limit: the maximum number of objects in array. Maximum is 100.
        • offset: the object offset for pagination. Default is 0.
        handler - the response handler

      • getFollowed

        public void getFollowed(VideosResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Video's from channels that the authenticated user is following. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_READ
        Parameters:
        handler - the response handler
